title: Veggie Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a pan.
Add garlic and onion; sauté 2 mins.
Add vegetables and stir-fry 5–7 mins.
Add soy sauce; toss and serve with rice or noodles.

title: Chana Masala
steps: Sauté onion, ginger, garlic.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook down.
Add chickpeas and simmer 10 mins.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

title: Paneer Tikka (Pan)
steps: Mix yogurt with spices; coat paneer and veggies.
Pan-sear until charred and cooked.
Serve with lemon and mint.

title: Tomato Basil Pasta
steps: Cook pasta al dente.
Sauté garlic, add chopped tomatoes; reduce.
Toss with pasta and basil; season.

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes, simmer 10 mins.
Blend and stir in cream; season.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread.
Mash avocado with lemon; spread and season.

title: Masala Omelette
steps: Beat eggs; mix chopped veggies.
Cook in pan until set.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Grill seasoned chicken; slice.
Toss veggies and add chicken; dress.

title: Dal Tadka
steps: Boil lentils until soft.
Temper spices with onion, garlic, tomato; mix with dal.

title: Vegetable Biryani
steps: Parboil rice.
Cook veggies with spices and yogurt.
Layer with rice and steam.

title: Aloo Paratha
steps: Make dough with flour and water.
Mash boiled potatoes with spices and onion.
Stuff and roll; cook on tawa.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
steps: Blend all until thick; top with granola.

title: Fluffy Pancakes
steps: Whisk ingredients into batter.
Cook small rounds until bubbles form; flip.

title: Shakshuka
steps: Cook onion and pepper; add tomatoes.
Simmer and crack eggs; cover to set whites.

title: Tofu Scramble
steps: Crumble tofu; sauté with onions and turmeric.
Add spinach to wilt; season.

title: Quinoa Salad
steps: Cook quinoa; cool.
Mix chopped veggies and lemon dressing.

title: Chana Chaat
steps: Mix all with spices and lemon; toss.

title: Fish Tacos (Pan)
steps: Season and pan-cook fish.
Assemble with cabbage and lime.

title: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Scramble eggs; set aside.
Stir-fry rice with veggies; add eggs and soy sauce.

title: Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook rice; arrange with toppings and dressing.

title: Veg Hakka Noodles
steps: Boil noodles; stir-fry veggies.
Toss noodles with sauces.

title: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomato and mozzarella; layer with basil and drizzle olive oil.

title: Margherita Pizza (Pan/Oven)
steps: Make a quick dough with flour, yeast (or baking powder), water, salt, and oil; rest 10–15 mins.
Spread dough on pan or tray; top with crushed tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
Cook on stovetop covered (low heat) 10–15 mins or bake at 220°C for ~12 mins until cheese melts.

title: Masala Dosa
steps: Grind soaked rice and lentils; ferment or rest.
Cook dosa on tawa.
Stuff with spiced potato masala and fold.

title: Idli with Sambar
steps: Steam fermented rice-lentil batter into idlis.
Boil lentils; add veggies and spices for sambar.
Serve hot with idli.

title: Tomato Rasam
steps: Crush tomatoes with spices.
Boil briefly; temper mustard, cumin, garlic.
Garnish with cilantro.

title: Palak Paneer
steps: Blanch and blend spinach.
Sauté aromatics; add paneer and spinach puree.
Finish with cream.

title: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken; cook till done.
Simmer tomato-butter sauce; add chicken and cream.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Brown onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes and spices; cook.
Add chicken; simmer until tender.

title: Rajma (Kidney Beans Curry)
steps: Cook soaked beans until tender.
Sauté onion, garlic; add tomato and spices.
Combine and simmer.

title: Kadai Paneer
steps: Sauté onions and peppers with spices.
Add paneer and tomato gravy; simmer.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Blend tomato base; simmer with butter.
Add paneer and cream; cook briefly.

title: Dal Makhani
steps: Cook lentils till creamy.
Add tomato, spices, butter, and cream; simmer.

title: Kanda Poha
steps: Rinse poha; drain.
Temper spices with onion and optional potato; toss poha.
Finish with lemon and cilantro.

title: Rava Upma
steps: Roast rava (semolina).
Sauté veggies; add water and rava; stir till fluffy.

title: Pav Bhaji
steps: Boil and mash veggies with spices.
Toast pav with butter and serve with bhaji.

title: Vada Pav
steps: Make spiced potato balls; pan-fry.
Assemble in pav with chutneys.

title: Lemon Rice
steps: Temper mustard, chili.
Toss with cooked rice and lemon juice.

title: Jeera Rice
steps: Temper cumin in ghee/oil.
Toss with cooked rice; season.

title: Aloo Gobi
steps: Sauté spices and onions.
Add potato and cauliflower; cook until tender.

title: Bhindi Masala
steps: Sauté okra separately.
Cook onion-tomato masala; combine with okra.

title: Egg Curry
steps: Boil eggs; peel.
Simmer onion-tomato gravy; add eggs.

title: Fish Curry
steps: Simmer spices with onion and tomato.
Add fish and coconut milk; cook gently.

title: Tandoori Chicken (Oven/Pan)
steps: Marinate in yogurt and spices.
Roast or pan-cook until charred and done.

title: Chole Bhature
steps: Cook spiced chickpea curry.
Make and fry bhature (or pan-cook).

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Cook pasta.
Sauté garlic in oil; toss pasta with chili and parsley.

title: Penne Arrabbiata
steps: Cook pasta.
Simmer spicy tomato-garlic sauce; toss.

title: Pesto Pasta
steps: Cook pasta.
Blend basil, oil, cheese; toss with pasta.

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
steps: Cook pasta.
Simmer butter and cream; melt cheese; combine.

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Sauté onion and mushrooms.
Add rice; ladle stock until creamy; finish with cheese.

title: Minestrone Soup
steps: Sauté vegetables; add tomato and stock.
Simmer with beans and pasta.

title: Bruschetta
steps: Toast bread with garlic.
Top with tomato-basil mixture.

title: Guacamole
steps: Mash avocado; fold in chopped veg and lime; season.

title: Pico de Gallo
steps: Combine chopped ingredients; season.

title: Veg Quesadilla
steps: Stuff tortillas with veggies and cheese; toast until melted.

title: Bean Burrito
steps: Warm tortillas; fill with beans, rice, cheese, and salsa; roll.

title: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Sear marinated chicken and veggies.
Serve with lime and tortillas (corn for GF).

title: Veg Enchiladas
steps: Fill tortillas, roll, cover with sauce and cheese; bake/pan-cook until bubbly.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter bread; pan-toast with cheese until melty.

title: Mac and Cheese
steps: Cook pasta.
Make cheese sauce; combine and bake optional.

title: Caesar Salad (veg)
steps: Toast croutons.
Toss lettuce with yogurt-parmesan dressing; top with croutons.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Simmer chicken and vegetables.
Add noodles; cook until tender.

title: Veggie Burger
steps: Form patties from beans and spices; pan-cook.
Assemble burgers with toppings.

title: Coleslaw
steps: Shred veg; mix with dressing; chill.

title: Hummus
steps: Blend all until smooth; season.

title: Falafel (Pan)
steps: Pulse ingredients; form patties; pan-fry.

title: Tabbouleh
steps: Chop finely; toss with lemon and olive oil.

title: Baba Ganoush
steps: Roast eggplant; blend with garlic, lemon, oil.

title: Greek Salad
steps: Chop veg; toss with feta and olive oil.

title: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
steps: Sear chicken; simmer with soy sauce and sweetener.
Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

title: Mapo Tofu (Veg)
steps: Sauté aromatics and mushrooms.
Add tofu and sauce; simmer.

title: Miso Soup (veg)
steps: Simmer broth; add tofu and greens; season lightly.

title: Veg Ramen
steps: Simmer broth with mushrooms.
Cook noodles; assemble bowls with toppings.

title: Cucumber Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook rice; season; roll with cucumber; slice.

title: Orange Chicken (Pan)
steps: Pan-fry chicken; toss with orange-soy glaze.

title: Pad Thai (Veg)
steps: Soak noodles; stir-fry sauce, tofu, noodles.
Add optional egg; finish with lime.

title: Thai Green Curry (Veg)
steps: Simmer curry paste with coconut milk.
Add veggies and tofu; cook until tender.

title: Thai Red Curry Chicken
steps: Simmer curry paste with coconut milk; add chicken and peppers.

title: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Simmer broth with aromatics; add fish and mushrooms; finish with lime.

title: Mango Sticky Rice
steps: Cook sticky rice; mix coconut milk and sugar; serve with mango.

title: Oats Porridge
steps: Simmer oats in milk; sweeten to taste; add fruit.

title: Chia Pudding
steps: Mix and refrigerate until set; top with fruit.

title: Granola Parfait
steps: Layer yogurt, granola, and fruit in a glass.

title: French Toast
steps: Whisk egg and milk; dip bread; pan-cook till golden.

title: Pani Puri (assembly)
steps: Make tangy mint water; fill puris with potato and chickpeas; serve immediately.

title: Bhel Puri
steps: Mix puffed rice with chopped veg and chutneys; toss and serve.

title: Moong Dal Khichdi
steps: Cook rice and lentils together; temper cumin; season.

title: Lentil Soup
steps: Simmer lentils with aromatics until tender; season.

title: Vegetable Stew (coconut)
steps: Simmer vegetables in coconut milk with spices.

title: Beetroot Salad
steps: Boil or roast beets; slice and dress with lemon and oil.

title: Masala Chai
steps: Boil water with spices; add tea and milk; simmer; strain.

title: Lime Soda
steps: Mix lime juice, sugar, and chilled soda; serve.
